issue.title: Load PID joint controller parameters from sdf

content.raw: I added the joint names list and regex functionality and created pull request #2751. I will look into supporting a `<tolerance>` element in place of the `<pid_gains>` and testing it on the robonaut model. I am not completely sure how to set the ID gains automatically. Perhaps default to an iGain of 0 and dGain proportional to the square root of the pGain?
content.html: I added the joint names list and regex functionality and created pull request #2751. I will look into supporting a <tolerance> element in place of the <pid_gains> and testing it on the robonaut model. I am not completely sure how to set the ID gains automatically. Perhaps default to an iGain of 0 and dGain proportional to the square root of the pGain?
